title: Automation Operations
content:
From the main menu go to Run > Automation Operations.

Selecting Automation Operations will open the Operations Orchestration (OO) Central.

Operations Orchestration (OO) Central is a web based application used for promoting flows, running flows, administering the system, and extracting and analyzing data resulting from flow runs.

Navigate to the following topics for more information on how to use OO Central.

  • Navigating OO Central
  • Run a flow
  • Run and monitor flows
  • Track and manage flow runs
  • Test and troubleshoot a flow run
  • Adjust the display of flow runs
